sentences.en: After an inspection, the inspectors must publish a report.
sentences.cn: 在视察之后，视察者必须发表一份报告。

sentences.en: Collins Harvill had it in mind to publish a short volume about Pasternak.
sentences.cn: 柯林斯·哈维尔公司打算出版一本帕斯捷尔纳克的小诗集。

sentences.en: He had decided to publish the manuscript no matter what.
sentences.cn: 他决定无论如何都要出版那部手稿。

sentences.en: I don't encourage people to take photographs like this without permission, but by law we can publish.
sentences.cn: 我不鼓励人们未经允许就拍摄这样的照片，但根据法律我们可以刊登。

sentences.en: If you could finish it by January, they might publish It'sooner.
sentences.cn: 如果你在一月之前写完, 他们可能会更早把它出版.

sentences.en: Lang Man's publishing house will publish a new book in next month.
sentences.cn: 朗曼出版社下月将出版一本新书.

sentences.en: My object was to publish a scholarly work on Peter Mourne.
sentences.cn: 我的目标是出版一本关于彼得·莫恩的学术著作。

sentences.en: Prime minister will publish the broadcasting speech this evening.
sentences.cn: 首相将于今晚发表广播演说.

sentences.en: The editor says they cannot publish all the letters they received.
sentences.cn: 编辑说他们不可能刊登他们收到的所有的信函.

sentences.en: The first edition was published in 1765.
sentences.cn: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.en: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

sentences.en: The society publish its list of member annually.
sentences.cn: 该协会每年出版其会员名单。

sentences.en: They also publish an excellent cookery book called "The Flavours Of Gujarat" (£2.95, plus £0.25 p & p).
sentences.cn: 他们还出版了一本很好的食谱，名叫《古吉拉特美食》（2.95英镑，外加0.25英镑邮资及包装费）。

sentences.en: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.cn: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.en: They publish reference books.
sentences.cn: 他们出版工具书。

sentences.en: Washington struck me as a precarious place from which to publish such a cerebral newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我的感觉是，在华盛顿出版这样一份理性的报纸不是太靠谱。

sentences.en: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.
sentences.cn: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。

sentences.en: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.en: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.en: When are you going to publish this work of yours?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候出版你这部作品?

words.tran_cn: 出版；发行（publish的现在分词形式）；发表

trans.tran_en: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold

trans.tran_cn: 出版， 刊印； 公布， 发表
trans.tran_en: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold
